duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate prospect strategy meetings and oversee data-related projects
Develop, oversee, and maintain strategic donor projects for engaging philanthropic support
Work collaboratively to maintain donor projects and engagements
Manage and follow through on several projects with minimal supervision
Act with tact and diplomacy when interacting with senior leadership, faculty, and development staff
Hybrid position with a combination of on-campus and remote work

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a related field (Master's preferred)
